ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var objectName = p('salesforce.objects.customerHousehold') var limitValue = attributes.queryParams.limit default "100" var offsetValue = attributes.queryParams.offset default "0" --- "SELECT Id, Household_Name__c, Primary_Contact__c, Address__c, City__c, State__c, Zip_Code__c FROM $(objectName) ORDER BY Household_Name__c LIMIT $(limitValue) OFFSET $(offsetValue)"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map (item, index) -> { Id: item.Id, Household_Name__c: item.Household_Name__c, Primary_Contact__c: item.Primary_Contact__c, Address__c: item.Address__c, City__c: item.City__c, State__c: item.State__c, Zip_Code__c: item.Zip_Code__c }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- [{ Household_Name__c: payload.Household_Name__c, Primary_Contact__c: payload.Primary_Contact__c, Address__c: payload.Address__c, City__c: payload.City__c, State__c: payload.State__c, Zip_Code__c: payload.Zip_Code__c }]
